Package com.sun.identity.authentication.spi

Class LoginTimeOutException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.security.GeneralSecurityException
          • javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
            • com.sun.identity.authentication.spi.AuthLoginException
              • com.sun.identity.authentication.spi.LoginTimeOutException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    L10NMessage, Serializable
    public class LoginTimeOutException
extends AuthLoginException
    Exception that is thrown when the user-entered tokens cause the authentication module to be authenticated to fail.
    See Also:
